document.full_text: alexandre burrows, who was at the center of a biting incident in game 1, scored the decisive goal in overtime as the canucks took a 2-0 series lead over the bruins in the stanley cup finals.
document.title: canucks 3, bruins 2 (ot): burrows strikes in overtime to put canucks in command
lines_and_colors: alexandre burrows, who was at the center of a biting incident in game 1, scored the decisive goal in overtime as the canucks took a 2-0 series lead over the bruins in the stanley cup finals.
